ValidationRule.description: Attendance field of Online Appointment is mandatory in order to send the quotation to the customer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Origin__c , 'LV App-Appointment Call'), ISPICKVAL( Origin__c , 'LV App-Appointment Video Call')), Attendace_filled__c = false, ISPICKVAL(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c, 'Preliminary Quote Pending Validation'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Attendance Of Online Appointment should be completed before Sending Quotations. In the case you have an DCS without an appointment, please add one.
